entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING ENDED, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:27 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:28 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
